chat_history.message:
Hello, My product iPhone 13 has the above problem: According to Back Market, the package was delivered. However, I didn't receive it and UPS also says that it hasn't been delivered yet. Although it's already been at UPS in Hamburg for a week.
Thank you very much for your help,

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Fatma - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hi!

The package hasn't been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost package policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been provided by the customer and shared in this conversation.

You can use the documents in the details to look into the matter with your delivery company

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 1 business day or this order will be refunded.

You can now block the device remotely, if possible.

All the best,
Fatma, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare, 

Please ask the customer to provide HANDWRITTEN CND with IMEI of the device. Thank you.

Regards,
KW

Dear ecomobile

here the handwritten document.

Can you please send the customer a new device 

Thank you


Regards,
Fatma from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We will check if we have available stocks for replacement. In the case of a replacement, we want to ensure that the customer's address is correct. Kindly assist us in confirming that the customer's shipping address is as follows, in order to ensure the delivery can occur smoothly and accurately. 

Michael Holtmann
Alversloweg 30a
22359 Hamburg
Germany
0160 90992967
shipping_11906603_40780559@eu.perso-email.com

Please let us know if there are any updates or corrections needed, in order for us to ship the parcel promptly. Thank you.

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

Thank you for your feedback.

I will be happy to send you the address again with the correct e-mail address:


Michael Holtmann
Alversloweg 30a
22359 Hamburg
Deutschland
0160 90992967
mi.holtmann@t-online.de

Regards,
Fatma from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The courier is still investigating this issue. As such, we are unable to ship out a new device until we can confirm that the parcel is lost. We will keep you updated and seek your understanding, please do not refund the customer yet.

Regards,
RK
